oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Inside Nashville presentation - Biff Collie - 1979-10-02
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of a pitch segment of Inside Nashville, featuring Biff Collie (host), to be presented to various radio stations for syndication. Recorded on October 2, 1979.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified] introduces Biff Collie -- Opening theme (incomplete) -- Biff Collie talks about Johnny Cash's ancestry -- Collie talks about Andy Williams -- Collie talks about Ernest Tubb facts -- Collie talks about Bally Parton pinball machines -- Closing theme -- Biff Collie talks about KFC -- Collie talks about a party Jimmy Carter had -- Collie talks about Kitty Wells singing at a Sounds game -- Collie talks about a Steelers player recording in Nashville -- Collie talks about Willie Nelson playing at the Kentucky state fair -- Closing theme -- Collie does an advertisement for Dwight's Restaurant -- Collie talks about Pee Wee King being robbed in Massachusetts -- Collie talks about a Lester Flatt memorial -- Collie talks about Kenny Rogers hosting the Tonight Show -- Collie talks about Kenny Roger's The Gambler at the number one spot -- Inside Nashville advertisement (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Collie, Biff;
